Completeness.description: How well the task is performed and its objective is achieved

Efficiency.description: The effectiveness of each action taken to solve and achieve the task's goal

Problem_solviing.description: The ability to think, plan, and make decisions while solving the task

Action_Sequence.description: The logical order of actions taken while solving the task

Adherence_to_Format.description: Strictly following the format for thought and action outputs

Contingency_planning.description: Adjusting actions based on the environment's feedback

Valid_action_selection.description: Choosing actions only from the given available actions

Termination_use.description: Using the TERMINATE command only under appropriate circumstances
